name: coronary artery calcifications
description: Atherosclerotic calcifications of the coronary arteries

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether calcification is present in the coronary arteries.

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: Presence of coronary artery calcification cannot be determined.

values.name: unknown
values.description: Presence of coronary artery calcification is unknown.

attributes.name: cac severity category
attributes.description: Categorizes coronary artery calcification based on the total Agatston score.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Identifies which coronary arteries are involved in the calcification.

values.name: left main coronary artery
values.description: Calcification present in the left main coronary artery.

values.name: left circumflex artery
values.description: Calcification present in the left circumflex artery.

values.name: left anterior descending artery
values.description: Calcification present in the left anterior descending artery.

values.name: right coronary artery
values.description: Calcification present in the right coronary artery.

attributes.name: agatston score
attributes.description: Agatston score for coronary artery calcification, used to quantify severity.

attributes.name: arterial age
attributes.description: Numeric value calculated from the Agatston score, providing an estimation of arterial age.
